setupNotes: MINIMAL SETUP: Simple beginner-friendly script. Use exact character distribution. SETUP PROCESS: 1) Use only the 8 characters listed. 2) Give Drunk reminder if needed. 3) Distribute characters randomly. 4) Begin straightforward first night.
howToRun: A minimal TB showcase. Keep it simple: one Demon, one Minion, clean info, minimal distortion.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

otherNights: OTHER NIGHTS ORDER: 1) Poisoner: Choose player to poison. 2) Imp: Choose player to kill.
tipsAndTricks: Good: Share early, execute on confirmable leads. Evil: Keep lies tiny; big swings get caught in simple setups.
bluffing: Use classic TB bluffs (Soldier/Saint/Fortune Teller) and avoid complexity.

modifiers.note: Drunk needs Townsfolk with abilities to malfunction.
